  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/110613</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/110613</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Opeke znanja</string>
            <string language="en">Bricks of knowledge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ziegelsteine des Wissens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Briques de la connaissance</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tijolos do conhecimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mattoni di conoscenza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τούβλα της γνώσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ladrillos del conocimiento</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Kako na prijeten način pripraviti učence do tega, da bodo pri ogledovanju enciklopedij ali drugih neumetnostnih knjig tudi prebrali besedilo pod sliko, znali poiskati podatek, znali uporabiti vire?</string>
            <string language="en">Fun game that encourages pupils to read - the box is filled with pieces of paper with random question regarding some books - answers equipped with pictures are posted on the wall.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">enciklopedija</string>
            <string language="en">encyclopedia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">branje</string>
            <string language="en">reading</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">bralno razumevanje</string>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">besedilo</string>
            <string language="en">text</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spaßspiel, das Schüler anregt, - der Kasten mit
Papierstreifen mit der gelegentlichen Frage betreffend ist einige 
Bücher gefüllt wird - die Antworten zu lesen, die mit Abbildungen 
ausgerüstet werden, werden bekanntgegeben auf der Wand.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le jeu d'amusement qui encourage des élèves à 
lire - le cadre est rempli de morceaux de papier avec la question 
aléatoire concernant quelques livres - des réponses équipées des 
images sont signalés sur le mur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O jogo do divertimento que incentiva os alunos 
ler - a caixa é enchido com as partes de papel com a pergunta 
aleatória a respeito de alguns livros - as respostas equipadas com os
retratos é afixado na parede.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il gioco di divertimento che consiglia agli 
allievi leggere - la casella è riempito di pezzi di carta con la 
domanda casuale per quanto riguarda alcuni libri - le risposte dotate 
delle immagini è inviato sulla parete.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το παιχνίδι διασκέδασης που ενθαρρύνει τους μαθητές 
για να διαβάσει - το πεδίο γεμίζουν με τα κομμάτια του χαρτί με 
την τυχαία ερώτηση σχετικά με μερικά βιβλία - τις απαντήσεις που
εξοπλίζονται με τις εικόνες ταχυδρομείται στον τοίχο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El juego de la diversión que anima a pupilas que
lean - el rectángulo se llena de los pedazos de papel con la pregunta
al azar con respecto a algunos libros - las respuestas equipadas de 
los cuadros se fija en la pared.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Enzyklopädie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messwert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Text</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">encyclopédie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">texte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">enciclopédia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">texto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">enciclopedia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">testo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εγκυκλοπαίδεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ανάγνωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση ανάγνωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κείμενο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">enciclopedia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comprensión de la lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">texto</string>
          </keyword>
